segments.text: Could you project what you would like to be doing five years from now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As I have some administrative experience from my last job , I may use my organizational and planning skills in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you plan to accomplish this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By doing everything necessary and for further study .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long would you like to stay with this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long I will stay with the company depends on whether the company and I are satisfied with each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of this industry's outlook in five years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do believe this industry will be developed rapidly in 5 years time .
segments.speaker: S2
